identity.name: LedgerOS
principles: Data is the art: No decorations, only data.
White is a color: Use 3 shades of white to create depth.
Borders over Shadows: 1px borders define structure. Shadows are for floating elements only.
Monospace for Money: All financial data must be in JetBrains Mono.

secondary.usage: Currency, Dates, Transaction IDs, Tabular Data

cards.classes: bg-white border border-border shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-all

images.login_bg: Use CSS Gradient: bg-gradient-to-br from-slate-100 to-slate-200

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME ENFORCEMENT: The user explicitly requested LIGHT THEME. You MUST update 'src/index.css' with the HSL values provided in the 'colors' section of this JSON. Do not use the dark mode values currently in the file.
2. FONT STRATEGY: Use 'Manrope' for all UI text and 'JetBrains Mono' for ALL numerical data (amounts, dates, account numbers). This is non-negotiable for the 'Finance-Heavy' feel.
3. LAYOUT DENSITY: This is a dashboard for a pro user. Do not use massive paddings inside data tables. Use 'table-dense' styles. Keep information density high but legible.
4. NO CLUTTER: Avoid decorative illustrations. Use whitespace and 1px borders to separate content.
5. INTERACTION: Add 'hover:bg-muted/50' to all table rows and list items. Interactive elements must feel responsive.
6. SHADCN OVERRIDE: Override default Shadcn 'radius' to 0.3rem or 0.5rem. Do not use fully rounded (pill) buttons unless specified.
7. DATA-TESTID: You MUST add 'data-testid' to every interactive element (buttons, inputs, links). Format: 'page-section-element-action' (e.g., 'dashboard-balance-card-view-btn').
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry where possible.
Micro-interactions: Buttons should scale down slightly on click (active:scale-95).
Toast Notifications: Use 'sonner' for all success/error messages.
Loading States: Use Skeleton loaders that match the layout structure, not just spinning circles.
